name: IPX800
description: This plugin provide access to IPX800 equipment

IPAddress.name: IP Address
IPAddress.description: the IP address of the equipment

authentication.name: key to access the IPX800
authentication.description: Only if the key is enabled

extensions.name: Extensions
extensions.description: List of extensions connected to the IPX800

values.X-8D: X-8D : Extension module with 8 Digital inputs
values.X-24D: X-24D : Extension module with 24 Digital inputs
values.X400-CT: X400-CT : Extension module for intensity clamps
